venue.name: Fearing Pond, Myles Standish State Forest

item.description:
The Friends of Myles Standish State Forest, the Department of Conservation and Recreation and MassWildlife present the 5th Annual Take Me Fishin'!—a free, family event.

Fishing poles and bait will be provided, or bring your own. Prizes awarded for biggest fish and many runner's up!

MA fishing license is provided by MassWildlife this day only between 10am and 3pm.   

Join us for fishing contests and fun nature activities for all ages. 

Activities include:  Make Your Own Forest Critters, Forest Discovery, Ping Pong Goldfish, Goytaku Fish Printing, Birding for Children, Beginning Letterboxing, Raffle for MSSF, and the 2011 Photography Contest Awards. 

Bring a picnic or BBQ and plan to spend the whole day. Fearing Pond is arguably the most beautiful pond in MSSF but it is open to the general public one day only—at the fishing event!

The event will happen rain or shine. Leashed dogs are welcome, but not in the water, please. The event will take place at Fearing Pond which is stocked with trout. Enter the Forest and follow the fish signs. 

  • This fun family fishing event is accessible, free and open to the public.  

TELL YOUR FRIENDS!

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Take Me Fishin'!
